H1.text: who is the senior senator of louisiana. John Breaux

H3.text: who is the senior senator of louisiana. Mary Landrieu

A4.text: In 2004 Landrieu became Louisiana's senior senator upon the retirement of John Breaux, who was replaced by Republican David Vitter.
